title: Larry & Family
description: The Johnson family are a very interesting bunch. Larry is a fun loving cat who likes relaxing in mum’s dressing gown and dad’s slippers and is never too far away from mischief. The children, Emily, Daisy and Jack, learn to love reading books with the help of Mum, Ken the smart parrot and old Helga, their next door neighbour.
author: Victoria   Anderson
